alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 29 at 5:31PM CST until December 29 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 569 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS ASHLEY CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL MOREHOUSE WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW HOLMES HUMPHREYS YAZOO IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI SUNFLOWER WASHINGTON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BASTROP, BELZONI, CARROLLTON, COLUMBUS, CROSSETT, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, EUPORA, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, HAMBURG, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LEXINGTON, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, NORTH CARROLLTON, NORTH CROSSETT, OAK GROVE, PICKENS, ROLLING FORK, RULEVILLE, STARKVILLE, TCHULA, VAIDEN, WEIR, WEST CROSSETT, WEST POINT, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
